facts.content: CSSinTS Compiler uses Turborepo, Bun, Effect TS 4 Beta, OXC parser/transformer, Lightning CSS, tsdown, Vite 8, Vitest, TypeScript Go, OXC lint/fmt, Knip
turbo run build, turbo run dev, turbo run test
oxlint --type-aware for linting, oxfmt for formatting
Wants AGENTS.md file for agentic coding agents with build/lint/test commands and code style guidelines
